Text.val: 11.07.2011 SH SCR16595 Changed input parameter to alpha to enable submit of BCM016C
05.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
01.04.2009 SH SCR14516 Major changes removed step 4 "UpdateCMCD"
05.02.2008 AK SCR13359 addedparameter Pi.GNRL_CODE when calling BCM016A

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = :2 and INVO_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALI<>0 and INVO_CODDRAFT = 'Y' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
